title: What is phantom traffic and why is it ruining your life? - Benjamin Seibold

multiple-choice.question: What is a phantom traffic jam?

options.label: A
options.text: A traffic jam caused by an accident or roadwork

options.label: B
options.text: An emergent phenomenon where traffic comes to a near standstill for no apparent reason

options.label: C
options.text: A traffic jam that occurs during rush hour

options.label: D
options.text: A traffic jam that occurs on a highway with a low speed limit

multiple-choice.question: What is the critical density of cars on the road for a phantom traffic jam to form?

options.label: A
options.text: Cars spaced less than 10 meters apart

options.label: B
options.text: Cars spaced less than 35 meters apart

options.label: C
options.text: Cars spaced less than 50 meters apart

options.label: D
options.text: Cars spaced less than 60 meters apart

multiple-choice.question: What type of feedback loop is responsible for the dynamic instability in phantom traffic jams?

options.label: A
options.text: The car behind them accelerates to catch up

options.label: B
options.text: The car behind them brakes slightly as well

options.label: C
options.text: A wave of brake lights propagates backward through the cars on the road

multiple-choice.question: What happens to traffic flow when the density of cars on the road is low?

options.label: A
options.text: Drivers accelerating too rapidly out of a slowdown

options.label: B
options.text: Drivers braking too hard to avoid a collision

multiple-choice.question: What technology may help reduce phantom traffic jams by providing real-time data on traffic conditions ahead?

options.label: A
options.text: Self-driving cars equipped with data on traffic conditions ahead

multiple-choice.question: How many self-driving cars are needed to dampen and prevent traffic waves in a recent experiment?

options.label: C
options.text: They have no impact on air pollution

multiple-choice.question: Why do drivers tend to make traffic worse in phantom traffic jams?

options.label: B
options.text: They are unaware of road conditions ahead

multiple-choice.question: What happens when drivers accelerate too rapidly out of a slowdown in phantom traffic jams, creating another feedback loop?

options.label: A
options.text: They help to dissipate the traffic wave

options.label: B
options.text: They create another feedback loop that causes more stop-and-go traffic

options.label: C
options.text: They have no effect on the traffic wave

options.label: D
options.text: They slow down the traffic wave

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: They remove traffic lights to improve traffic flow

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: A combination of driver behavior and vehicle density

options.label: A
options.text: They help to dissipate the traffic wave

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: They have no effect on the traffic wave

options.label: D
options.text: They slow down the traffic wave

multiple-choice.question: What is the main environmental impact of phantom traffic jams?

options.label: C
options.text: They have no impact on greenhouse gas emissions

multiple-choice.question: What is the role of self-driving cars in reducing phantom traffic congestion?

options.label: A

options.label: B

options.label: C

title: What really happened during the Salem Witch Trials - Brian A. Pavlac

options.label: A

options.text: It decreases your likelihood of an early death by 14 percent.

options.label: C
options.text: It has no effect on your likelihood of an early death.

options.label: D
options.text: It increases your likelihood of an early death by 50 percent.

options.label: B
options.text: It can lead to increased self-esteem and confidence.

options.label: C
options.text: It has no effect on your mental health.

options.label: D
options.text: It can lead to improved relationships with others.

options.label: D
